abstract: Time Warner said the nomination of Jonathan Miller, the former chairman and chief executive of its AOL Internet unit, violated a noncompete agreement entered with Mr. Miller.
snippet: Time Warner said the nomination of Jonathan Miller, the former chairman and chief executive of its AOL Internet unit, violated a noncompete agreement entered with Mr. Miller.
lead_paragraph: SAN JOSE, Calif.  Time Warner said Friday that it had blocked the nomination of Jonathan Miller, the former chairman and chief executive of its AOL Internet unit, to the board of Yahoo.

headline.main: Time Warner Blocks a Yahoo Board Choice
headline.print_headline: Time Warner Blocks a Yahoo Board Choice

byline.original: By Miguel Helft and Laurie J. Flynn
